about_the_game:
Pocket Garden is a super cute little indie game where you can build the coziest gardens and have the best time ever! No worries about resources, fighting, or health. 

BUILD WHAT YOU WANT, HOW YOU WANT, AND WHEN YOU WANT 

Get ready to build your dream sweet garden! You'll have dozens of prepared elements, decorations, fences, and accessories to choose from. Let your imagination run wild as you create a garden oasis! 

DON'T WORRY ABOUT RESOURCES 

You don't have to worry about currency or resources. In Pocket Garden, the economy is all about your creativity. So, unleash it and build the cutest little garden you can think of! 

SIT BACK, RELAX AND UNWIND! 

We didn't want to create another competitive game. We just want to give you a tool to create something cool! The rest is up to you, dear player! 

Kacper & Marcin 

~ Developers of Pocket Garden

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2 GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon HD 7870, (2 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
